toxi.net

Interface ServerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerListenerAdapter

    public interface ServerListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clientConnected(toxi.net.UDPConnection conn)
      Notifies listener of a new client connection.
      void clientDisconnected(toxi.net.UDPConnection conn)
      Notifies listener a client has disconnected.
      void clientUpdated(toxi.net.UDPConnection conn, DatagramPacket receivePacket)
      Notifies and forwards received client data to the listener for further analysis.
      byte[] getSyncPayload()
      Gives the listener a chance to add extra data to the payload packet distributed to each client.
      void serverError(Exception e)
      Gives listener a chance to react to any fatal server errors.
      void serverShutdown()
      Notifies the listener server is shutting down.
      void serverStarted()
      Notifies listener immediately after the server socket has been created.
      void serverStateChanged(ServerState s)
      Notifies the listener of a new server state.

    • Method Detail

      • serverStarted

        void serverStarted()
        Notifies listener immediately after the server socket has been created.

      • serverShutdown

        void serverShutdown()
        Notifies the listener server is shutting down.

      • serverError

        void serverError(Exception e)
        Gives listener a chance to react to any fatal server errors.
        Parameters:
        e -

      • serverStateChanged

        void serverStateChanged(ServerState s)
        Notifies the listener of a new server state. The state info itself is attached.
        Parameters:
        s -

      • clientConnected

        void clientConnected(toxi.net.UDPConnection conn)
        Notifies listener of a new client connection. Details are attached.
        Parameters:
        conn -

      • clientDisconnected

        void clientDisconnected(toxi.net.UDPConnection conn)
        Notifies listener a client has disconnected. Connection details are attached.
        Parameters:
        conn -

      • clientUpdated

        void clientUpdated(toxi.net.UDPConnection conn,
                 DatagramPacket receivePacket)
        Notifies and forwards received client data to the listener for further analysis.
        Parameters:
        conn - client connection details
        receivePacket - data sent by the client

      • getSyncPayload

        byte[] getSyncPayload()
        Gives the listener a chance to add extra data to the payload packet distributed to each client.
        Returns:
        additional data, or null if none required
